WorkItem.Description:
Would it be possible to have IsEditing setter public?

The purpose is to be able to use binding to trigger an edit.
Basically I have a Rename command that set an IsEditing property to true in my view model, so I would like to trigger edition of the item via binding update.
Otherwise it's impossible to trigger an edit from a Command without having the view model to interact with the view (my view models here do not have access to the view)
